CustomField.description: -Ability to coordinate and execute services according to quotation/costing -Ability to ensure that all resources are well-prepared and properly equipped to carry out each and every job to the highest level of quality according to the quotation/costing -Ability to convey clearly and accurately, client's request to other relevant departments (espcially Operations, Warehouse, and Shipping) for timely follow-up and execution of the project -Ability to gather comprehensive information from clients for Operations/Warehouse preparation and planning -Ability to monitor and ensure that project is delivered in a timely and correct manner -Ability to manage & resolve any issues on site (External & Internal)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: -Ability to coordinate and execute services according to quotation/costing -Ensuring that all resources are well-prepared for the project -Ability to convey client's request accurately to other relevant departments for timely follow-up and execution of project -Ability to gather full information from client for Operations/Warehouse preparation and planning -Ability to ensure that project is delivered in a timely and correct manner -Ability to manage & resolve external/internal issues on site
CustomField.label: Project Management [CS]
